    • 字段详细资料

      • ACTION_WIFI_STATE_CHANGED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_WIFI_STATE_CHANGED
        WiFi network connect state changed. Get WiFi connect state by broadcast intent#getBooleanExtra(NetworkMonitor.EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE,false).
        If current WiFi network is connected,app can get current network info by intent#getParcelableExtra(NetworkMonitor.EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE), and get wifi info by intent#getParcelableExtra(EXTRA_WIFI_INFO).
        if current WiFi network is disconnected and previous state is connected, app can also get the previous network info by intent#getParcelableExtra(NetworkMonitor.EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO) and will return null if previous state is disconnected.
        另请参阅:
        NetworkMonitor.EXTRA_NETWORK_STATE, NetworkMonitor.EXTRA_NETWORK_INFO, NetworkMonitor.EXTRA_PRE_NETWORK_INFO, EXTRA_WIFI_INFO, 常量字段值

      • EXTRA_WIFI_INFO

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_WIFI_INFO
        WiFi info extras key.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • CONNECT_SUCCESS

        public static final int CONNECT_SUCCESS
        Connect WiFi success.

        常量字段值

        public static final int ERR_CONNECT_FAILED

      • ERR_CONNECT_TIMEOUT

        public static final int ERR_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
        Connect WiFi error code: timeout.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • ERR_PASSWORD_WRONG

        public static final int ERR_PASSWORD_WRONG
        Connect WiFi error code: password wrong.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • connectWiFi

        public int connectWiFi(android.net.wifi.ScanResult result,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       WiFiNetworkMonitor.WiFiConnectCallback callback)
        Connect WiFi. Support sync and async call method:
        If callback is null,will block the call thread and return result by synchronous.
        If callback not null,this method return -1 immediately and the connection result return by callback.

        Attention:not support connect new EAP network.

        参数:
        result - WiFi ScanResult
        password - WiFi password if needed
        callback - Connect result callback
        返回:
        Connect result

      • connectWiFi

        public int connectWiFi(java.lang.String ssid,
                       java.lang.String capabilities,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       WiFiNetworkMonitor.WiFiConnectCallback callback)
        Connect WiFi. Support sync and async call method:
        If callback is null,will block the call thread and return result by synchronous.
        If callback not null,this method return -1 immediately and the connection result return by callback.

        Attention:not support connect new EAP network.

        参数:
        ssid - WiFi SSID
        capabilities - WiFi capabilities
        password - WiFi password if needed
        callback - Connect result callback
        返回:
        Connect result

      • getWifiManager

        public android.net.wifi.WifiManager getWifiManager()

      • getNetwork

        public android.net.Network getNetwork()
        Return network. If wifi not connected or below android LOLLIPOP version return null.
        返回:
        Network
